mapper.select: select bkno, bkname, bkimg, bkwrite, bkprice, bkcate FROM books WHERE bkcate IN (SELECT b.bkcate FROM books b, trade t WHERE t.mid=1 AND b.bkno = t.bkno)
select z.zno, b.bkname, b.bkimg, b.bkwrite, z.bkno, (select count(*) from zzim z where z.mid = 1) as count from zzim z left join books b on z.bkno = b.bkno where z.mid = 1
mapper.delete: delete from zzim where zno = #{string} and mid=1
mapper.select:
select t.tno, b.bkimg, b.bkname, b.bkprice, t.tamount, t.tdate, t.tgroup, t.ttotal, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.tgroup) FROM books b JOIN trade t ON b.bkno = t.bkno WHERE t.mid = 1) as count from trade t left join books b on t.bkno = b.bkno
t.mid = 1
and t.tgroup like concat('%', #{searchV},'%') and b.bkname like concat('%', #{searchV},'%') and b.bkwrite like concat('%', #{searchV},'%')
group by t.tno order by t.tno desc
select r.rno, b.bkimg, b.bkname, b.rsdate, b.rddate from rental r left join books b on r.bkno = b.bkno where r.mid = 1 and b.rsdate is not null group by r.rno order by r.rno desc

select b.bno, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bdate, b.bcate from board b join members m on b.mno = m.mno
m.mid = 1 and b.bdel = 1 and b.bcate = #{cate}
and b.bno like concat('%', #{searchV},'%') and b.btitle like concat('%', #{searchV},'%') and b.bcontent like concat('%', #{searchV},'%')
order by b.bno desc
